personal_info.name: Chong Siow Yen
personal_info.role: Full-Stack Software Engineer | Cloud-Native Enterprise Solutions | DevOps & .NET
personal_info.bio: I am passionate about building scalable and secure software systems, blending strong fundamentals in software engineering with practical experience in cloud-native applications, DevOps, and AI integration. My goal is to drive positive impact through robust and innovative enterprise solutions.

services.name: Full-Stack Development
services.description: Delivering responsive and scalable applications using modern frameworks such as .NET Core, React, and Blazor.

services.name: Cloud-Native Engineering
services.description: Designing secure, scalable cloud solutions on Azure, AWS, and GCP.

services.name: AI Integration
services.description: Building intelligent systems with LLMs, vector search, and ML pipelines.

services.name: Enterprise DevOps
services.description: Implementing CI/CD pipelines and code quality assurance with Azure DevOps, SonarQube, and Docker.

services.name: Database Engineering
services.description: Crafting optimized database solutions using SQL Server, Oracle, and MySQL.

services.name: System Integration
services.description: Integrating legacy systems using ESBs (OpenESB), messaging queues, and API services.

services.name: Automation & Scripting
services.description: Automating tasks with scripting tools, test suites, and workflow builders.

frequently_asked_questions.question: what is the used technologies in this portfolio ?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: The UI of this portfolio was created using ReactJS, framer-motion and Tailwind CSS. The backend is powered by FastAPI and CrewAI for creating the agentic system workflow. For more details check the repositories: UI - https://github.com/SiowYenChong, Backend - (repo pending publication).
